example.eg: Historical records of the census can be searched online.
example.egtrans: 人口普查的历史记录可以在网上进行搜索查询。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 历史的, 过往的, 过去的

example.eg: Historical figures of the river's level are much higher.
example.egtrans: 该河流的历史水位数据要高得多。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 历史上的, 过去存在的

example.eg: To do a good job at historical fiction, you need to do lots of research.

dsense.name: historical film
dsense.guideword: (period movie, film set in the past)

example.eg: 'Gone with the Wind' is a classic example of an historical film.

dsense.name: historical monument
dsense.guideword: (building, etc., of cultural value) (具有文化价值的建筑等)

dsense.name: historical novel
dsense.guideword: (book of fiction set in a past era)

example.eg: Writing a decent historical novel requires a great deal of research.
